title: John Humphrys confessed to co-host Sarah Montague that he was earning five times as much as her before BBC pay gap was revealed
text:
John Humphrys confessed to his Today show co-host Sarah Montague that he was earning five times as much as her before BBC pay gap was revealed.

Last year Ms Montague revealed how she was “incandescent with rage” after realising that her male colleagues were paid more than her.

When the BBC’s gender pay gap was revealed in July 2017, Ms Montague learned that she was the only Radio 4 Today programme presenter who was earning less than £150,000.

While she was paid £133,000 for presenting Today, other Radio 4 work and her Hardtalk television interviews, her colleague John Humphrys, the veteran Today presenter and Mastermind host, was earning between £600,000 and £649,999.

However speaking at an event in central London this week, Ms Montague revealed that her co-host had confessed his salary to her before the BBC was forced to publish its pay gap figures.
description: John Humphrys confessed to his Today show co-host Sarah Montague that he was earning five times as much as her before BBC pay gap was revealed.
